body_html: GPU memory allocator by default takes up most of the GPU memory. There are session options to configure it to not do so. The bug referenced here is different in that GPU memory was being allocated even though GPU was not being used. That doesn't seem to be your case.
body_text: GPU memory allocator by default takes up most of the GPU memory. There are session options to configure it to not do so. The bug referenced here is different in that GPU memory was being allocated even though GPU was not being used. That doesn't seem to be your case.
body: GPU memory allocator by default takes up most of the GPU memory. There are session options to configure it to not do so. The bug referenced here is different in that GPU memory was being allocated even though GPU was not being used. That doesn't seem to be your case.
